attributes.action: No halal or kosher certified product receives any government subsidy.
attributes.background: Ensure no halal or kosher certified product receives any form of government subsidy. The same should apply to religiously slaughtered meat.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

We aren't sure what change you would like to see.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what subsidies you would like stopped.
